summary: In this context, Buta-1,3-diene and Butadiene are related as they refer to the same chemical compound, 1,3-butadiene, which is a volatile organic compound (VOC) associated with environmental tobacco smoke (ETS). The study highlights that ETS is a significant source of 1,3-butadiene, indicating its relevance in assessing air quality in restaurant environments. However, the terms are used interchangeably without further distinction or detailed discussion of their specific roles or differences.
